title: Auftauchen (2006) (Breaking the Surface) AVI XVID Original Germa
description:
Written and directed by Felicitas Korn, starring Henriette Heinze and Golo Euler.

This is the first torrent I've ever done, so be gentle. I went apeshit looking for this move all over the place and was only able to painstakingly download it - over the course of a day's worth of aborted downloads - from an overloaded fileshare server. I didn't rip this file, though the video quality seems quite good. I'm putting it out as a torrent in case anyone else decides they want it.

There's quite a lot of nudity and sexual activity in this film.

--

Summary:

The talented photography student Nadja (26) shoots exceptional images for the magazine "Subs" and is at the beginning of a promising career, when she falls head-over-heels in love with Darius, a community service workers 6 years her junior.

With him Nadja experiences a physical passion, the intensity of which goes beyond the boundaries of their everyday life. When she loses her job at "Subs" for her artistic quality and their intransigence, she examines her total fusion with Darius, from which she would prefer to never to resurface. She even puts her graduation in jeopardy.

But Darius thinks their unconditional devotion to love is not enough. When he breaks up with Nadia, it's the last straw. Without the hope of passionate love, life doesn't seem worth living for Nadja. Only if she opts for art may she find her way back to life.

--
